scene_states.name: On Components Enter (browser render)
User Clicks Mad Lib Tag

scene_states.description: A green button should show up with 100% opacity
scene_states.name: User Clicks Mad Second Tag

scene_states.description: Madlib tag should return back to original location. Green button should turn half opacity
scene_states.name: User clicks Second Madlib Tag again (to unclick).

scene_states.description: The empty splash tag should animate and have the class 'tada' for 1500s
scene_states.name: Click Green button anyways

scene_states.description: None of the tags should be empty. If there were previously filled in, they *should* unfill themselves & then transition out.
scene_states.name: Switch from academic category to baking

scene_states.description: None of the tags should be empty. If there were previously filled in, they *should* unfill themselves & then transition out.
scene_states.name: Switch from bakery category to tech

scene_states.description: None of the tags should be empty. If there were previously filled in, they *should* unfill themselves & then transition out.
scene_states.name: Switch from tech category to photography

scene_states.description: None of the tags should be empty. If there were previously filled in, they *should* unfill themselves & then transition out.
scene_states.name: Switch from tech category to houhsehold

scene_states.description: The dropdown value should change. The map should change (dw about tracking this but make sure u test it manually)
scene_states.name: Change just one university that is not the saerch button

scene_states.description: As long as it works - pass the test. Works as in, opens and closes with link/hyperlink
scene_states.name: Change to search one university

scene_states.description: If its easy trigger the escape button
scene_states.name: Press escape key or click close to go back.

scene_states.description: The one that shakes if both are not not. Pass the test if there is a background google mav div that shows up after.
scene_states.name: Finally - fill in the blank (from earlier step).
